function.name: list_files_in_directory
function.description: Provide a list of all reference documents that can be sent to the user before responding, when unable to accurately answer a private consultation in the user's specialized subfield.

function.name: send_a_file
function.description: Send a file to user. You must get file name from list_files_in_directory function first.

file_name.description: File name, you must get file name from list_files_in_directory function.
